channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Dell Peripheral Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Dell Peripheral Manager

item.title: CVE-2021-21545|2024-08-03T18:16:22.930Z -- dell -- dell%20peripheral%20manager
item.description: Dell Peripheral Manager 1.3.1 or greater contains remediation for a local privilege escalation vulnerability that could be potentially exploited to gain arbitrary code execution on the system with privileges of the system user.

item.title: CVE-2024-32857|2024-08-01T17:48:37.004Z -- dell -- dell%20peripheral%20manager
item.description: Dell Peripheral Manager, versions prior to 1.7.6, contain an uncontrolled search path element vulnerability. An attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability through preloading malicious DLL or symbolic link exploitation, leading to arbitrary code execution and escalation of privilege
